title: Alberto Mariola
text:
I’m a Postdoctoral Research Fellow working at the Episodic Memory Group with Prof Chris Bird.
Before that I completed my PhD within the 4-Year Sussex Neuroscience at the Sussex Centre for Consciousness working under the supervision of Prof Anil Seth, Dr Warrick Roseboom and Prof Luc Berthouze.
My work lies at the intersection of human perception, memory and metacognition. Specifically, I’m generally interested
Feel free to reach out to me via mail and/or via any of the reported social media platforms on the left (e.g., Twitter).
